instructions:
Bring a saucepan of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta, and cook until al dente, about 8 minutes. Drain.
In a separate saucepan, stir together the cream of mushroom soup, milk, water and mushrooms. Bring to a simmer, and cook until mushrooms are tender. Mix with cooked macaroni, and serve.
title: Mushrooms a la Gill
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
